data.actual_result: You get redirected to that channel without doing anything.
data.short_description: If you click on a channel (from a message) you don't have the permissions to see and then get someone to give you the permissions you need then you'll be redirected to that channel without doing anything.
data.steps_to_repro: - Ask someone to send a message including a channel you don't have the permissions to see. - Click on the channel and observe: the screen will update but will take you back to that channel where you were (as intended). - Now have someone to give you the permissions to see that channel and wait.
